titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 with respect to the treatment of prepaid derivative contracts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/19/2007--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to set forth rules for the treatment of income, loss, and distributions relating to a prepaid derivative contract. Defines "prepaid derivative contract" as any prepaid contract with a term longer than one year from the date of issue which is a derivative financial instrument with respect to any security, commodity, or financial index.
